name: Full Flight Prague to Venice - Czech Airlines ATR-72 - Beautiful Alps, Approach over Venice!
description:
Thanks for watching this Full Flight Experience!  For our ninth anniversary, my wife Beth and I decided to use some Delta miles and head over to Europe for a three-country tour. Our trip in November 2018 is one we'll never forgot; we still talk about it every day and reminisce fondly of the beautiful places we visited, the wonderful people we met, and the time we spent together.

We spent four days in Berlin, took a train to Prague and spent four more days in the Czech Republic. The last stop on our trip was Venice for three last days in Europe before heading home to the U.S. Thankfully, this short flight to our final destination covered some beautiful landscape, including the Italian Alps, the Bohemian countryside, and finally, a parallel descent right next to the world-famous Venetian lagoon.

This video covers our arrival at PRG, Prague International Airport, some diverse planespotting, then a take-off to landing review of our flight, as well as in-flight materials and procedures. The roar of a turboprop ATR72 always gets me excited for the trip ahead; thanks for flying in, and stay tuned for the upcoming legs of this journey to and from Europe!


--------------------------------

Flight Information
Airline: Czech Airlines
Flight Number: CSA734
Date of Flight: Friday, November 16th, 2018

Origin Airport: VÃ¡clav Havel Airport Prague (LKPR/PRG)
Destination Airport: Venice Marco Polo Airport (LIPZ/VCE)

Departing Gate: C14
Boarding Time: 12:50 CET
Scheduled Departure: 12:20 CET
Actual Departure from Stand: 13:17 CET
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 30 / 13:23 CET
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 04R / 14:59 CET
Scheduled Arrival: 14:00 CET
Actual Arrival at Remote Stand: 15:08 CET

--------------------------------

Aircraft Information
Type: ATR72-500
Registration: OK-NFV
Aircraft Delivery: April 2008
Seat: 5D & 5F
